Do you happen to have any information on the plot or genre of Dead Bodies?

Sure, Dead Bodies is an Irish psychological thriller movie released in 2003. The movie centers around a character named Tommy (played by Andrew Scott), who works as a hospital mortuary assistant. One day, he discovers a dead body with money in its mouth, and the incident sets him on a course of sudden and dangerous events. The movie is quite intense and has a grim edge to it. The narrative explores themes of grief, mental health, and desperation.
